name: Caper (Agentgjs)
description:
Caper is a top down rogue like game with pixel graphics! You play as a cat attempting to take down the forces of evil! Using icicles, wind, and hairballs you will fight mechanical spiders, bear traps, and a computer monstrosity. The forest needs you! The game also times you and counts your coins so try to go as fast as you can!

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Arrow Keys: Directional Shooting

Space: Reload (will auto reload if you try to shoot with no ammo)

ESC: Exit the game (can not exit during final cutscene)

Developers:

Lead Designer:  Gavin Sondrup

Lead Enemy AI Designer/Programmer: Tyler Poole

Lead Art Designer: Kayle Galindez

Lead Character Programmer/System Implementer: Chase Sondrup

Uses art from opengameart.org and royalty free music and sounds.
